content: Hello! How can I assist you today?
I'm just a digital assistant, so I don't have feelings, but I'm here and ready to help you with anything you need. How can I assist you today?
I am a large language model AI developed by OpenAI. You can call me AssistBot. How can I assist you today?
so can you give hello world python code
